p: Another study involving the treatment of herpes labialis lesions was performed with Huanglian-Jiedu Decoction, a Chinese medicine formulation that includes four kinds of Chinese herbs; Huanglian ( Rhizoma coptidis), Huangbo ( Cortex Phellodendri), Huangqin ( Scutellaria baicalensis) and Zhizi ( Scutellaria baicalensis) ( Clinicaltrials.gov Identifier NCT03469232). However, similar to the clinical study reported above, the results of this trial have not been published to date.
